content: Hear this word that I take up over you in lamentation, O house of Israel:
For thus says the  to the house of Israel:
Therefore thus says the , the God of hosts, the Lord:
Woe to you who desire the day of the !
It is darkness, and not light,
or went into the house and leaned his hand against the wall,
Is not the day of the  darkness, and not light,
“Did you bring to me sacrifices and offerings during the forty years in the wilderness, O house of Israel?
You shall take up Sikkuth your king, and Kiyyun your star-god—your images that you made for yourselves,
and I will send you into exile beyond Damascus,” says the , whose name is the God of hosts.
